findings.details: Added homepage prefetch for privacy policy and terms pages to speed legal navigation.
Manual scan found no placeholder/example.com links in posts/pages. External URLs not live-checked in offline audit.
SEO meta tags and structured data remain in place; no regressions detected.
Recent typography and layout improvements maintain good readability on mobile.

recommendations: Consider adding a lightweight offline link checker in CI if network access is available.
Continue validating navigation performance on mobile after prefetch updates.
